subject: Running
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Ridouane Harroufi of Morocco burst ahead on the downhill leading to the finish line at Folsom Field to win the 10-kilometer Bolder Boulder in Colorado for the second consecutive year. Harroufi finished in 28 minutes 32 seconds, one second ahead of Dmessew Tsega of Ethiopia.
